name: Burning Bulwark
desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user become burned. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user
shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: burn.
